department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

remark.ch: 醫學工程與資訊科學組

goal.en: -To understand the basic analyses of electronic circuit. -To design amplifiers circuit based on dc analysis and small signal model. -To familiarize the concept of Biomedical Electronics by designing electronic circuits using lumped circuit models and OP amps.
goal.ch: -了解基本的微電子學、電子電路設計與分析。 -設計基於直流分析和小信號模型的放大器電路並提升實作能力。 -使用集總電路模型和運算放大器設計電子電路並提升實作能力。 -經由電子設計與分析方法，熟悉應用微電子學的基礎內容。 -培養發展獨立思考與跨領域創新能力。

content.en:
Week 1
Review of MOSFETs, BJTs and amplifiers
Week 2
Ideal operational amplifiers with inverting and non-Inverting configuration
Week 3
Non-ideal operational amplifiers with inverting and non-Inverting configuration
Week 4
Small signal operation of operational amplifiers (I)
Week 5
Small signal operation of operational amplifiers (II)
Week 6
Other non-ideal effects and amplifier design with active load
Week 7
Frequency response analysis
Week 8
Exam (I)
Week 9
integrator and differentiator (I)
Week 10
integrator and differentiator (II)
Week 11
Filter Design (I)
Week 12
Filter Design (II)
Week 13
Instrumentation amplifier
Week 14
Comparator and Schmitt trigger
Week 15
IC bias current source, current mirror and current steering circuit
Week 16
Experiment (I) Basic operation circuit design and application
Week 17
Experiment (II) Filter design and application
Week 18
Exam (II)

en.competency: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning
